body: @gpJAyi7o I keep seeing you on, like, every hentai. And everytime, you're always talking about your discord group or something. I don't want to hurt anybody's feelings, but frankly it's getting annoying. Please stop advertising on the comment sections of this hentai site or whatever else hentai site you keep posting these on. No one wants to see that kind of thing after jacking off to some wholesome, fucked up, or weird ass hentai. Just stop.
